org.agreement_technologies.common.map_parser

Interface Metric

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskImp.MetricImp

    public interface Metric
    Metric interface provides methods to deal with metric functions.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MT_ADD 
      static int MT_MULT 
      static int MT_NUMBER 
      static int MT_PREFERENCE 
      static int MT_TOTAL_TIME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMetricType()
      Gets the metric type.
      double getNumber()
      Gets the numeric constant (only if type == MT_NUMBER).
      int getNumTerms()
      Gets the number of terms (only if type == MT_ADD or MT_MULT).
      java.lang.String getPreference()
      Gets the preference name (only if type == MT_PREFERENCE).
      Metric getTerm(int index)
      Gets a given term by its index.
